description: From Middle English bispitten, equivalent to be- +â€Ž spit. Compare bespet.

verbs.description: bespit (third-person singular simple present bespits, present participle bespitting, simple past bespat or bespit, past participle bespitten or bespit or bespat or bespitted)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To spit upon (someone or something); to soil with spittle.
